errors.error_description: In the 'Installation' section, the command to install `flask` is placed before the virtual environment is created and activated. Dependencies should be installed after activating the virtual environment to keep them isolated.
correction_candidates: Move the `$ pip install flask` command to be after the `$ source .venv/bin/activate` command.
Combine the flask installation with the client installation: `$ pip install flask -e .`
Delete the `$ pip install flask` command.
Move the virtual environment creation steps to the very top of the 'Installation' section.
errors.golden_answer: Move the `$ pip install flask` command to be after the `$ source .venv/bin/activate` command.
